remarks.format: ## Remarks 类对应于 OASIS SAML 1.1 规范中定义的 `` XML 元素。The class corresponds to the `` XML element that is defined in the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification. SamlSecurityToken 安全令牌的声明包含在 SAML 语句中，而这些语句又包含在 中。The claims for SamlSecurityToken security tokens are contained in SAML statements, which are in turn contained within a . 其中一个语句为 ，它将一组任意声明绑定到特定的 。One such statement is the , which binds a set of arbitrary claims to a particular . 这些声明被表示为 集合，并存储在 属性中。The claims are represented as a collection of and are stored in the property.
